sub_title: System Architect; Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt
summary:
System Architect & LSSA certified Lean Six Master Black Belt with 25 years history of working in science, medical, automotive & consumer industry. 
Professional with just do it mindset, leading by example with Master Black Belt evidence of business impact & rewarding.
Skilled in System Architecture, Design eXcellence, APQP and Continuous Improvement.
Closely working with professionals, creating technical breakthrough in projects & ways of working!
What we applied & learned today helps to do it better tomorrow!

profile_positions.description:
System Architecture Group,
As System Architect setting the conditions for designing predictable high-reliable systems.
Bring product quality & reliability for high-end transmission electron microscopes to the next level of maturity. Running and owning the monthly reference architecture System Design change control board, with review focus on system design realization and requirements flow down.  
As MBB / DfSS competence leader further strengthening the methodology @ the start of architecture creation with focus on design understanding by modeling transfer functions, de-risked (DFMEA) & MSA data validated.
Running and continuous improving the DfSS Green Belt program together with partner CQM.
profile_positions.title: System Architect; Certified Lean Six Sigma MBB

profile_positions.description:
System Integration Group,
As Reliability Architect/interim Reliability Engineer setting the conditions for designing high-reliable systems.
Bring product reliability, for high-end transmission electron microscopes, to the next level; by strengthening the Design for Reliability (DfR) methodology. 
Leading change with an hands-on approach during System Integration development programs.
profile_positions.title: Reliability Architect & Interim Reliability Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Reliability Solutions,
Principal Architect System Reliability:
Develop strategies to analyze, predict and monitor Quality & Reliability data of complex products as an input to new developments or improvements to existing products.
Coach and guide multi-disciplinary teams of technical experts in that process, in special during medical design control remediation work at several Philips business units. In general the remediation work is about better understanding the system design, requirements and risk. 


Master Black Belt Philips Innovation Services:
Philips business process owner of Requirements Engineering and FMEA.
PInS Member of Systems Engineering Center of Expertise
In alignment with management teams apply, manage or guide the implementation of Design for Six Sigma.
Leverage skills and practices throughout the Philips Innovation Services business via training, coaching and leading by example.
profile_positions.title: Principal Architect System Reliability; Lean Six Sigma MBB

profile_positions.description:
Industry Consulting,
Change management assignments & programs to embed DFSS during Integral Product Development projects, by being interim part of the R&D team. 
Convention leader for Design for eXcellence convention programs/projects
Lean leader for continuous improvement projects, starting with VSM workshop sessions.
System Architect, green belt & black belt coach and trainer.
profile_positions.title: Lean Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
TE Consumer Devices,
Technical leading new architecture & product development and its introduction.
Global product development support, best practice sharing with Asia region.
Coaching & leveling Resident engineers & support Lean continuous improvement projects in Asia.
profile_positions.title: Principal Engineer, Certified LDFSS BB

profile_positions.description:
TE Consumer Devices, 

Single Point Of Contact re-located @ Nokia devices team, Finland.
Capture global Voice Of Customer by translating Nokia needs to proposed system requirements and concepts acting as input for the development teams.
Handling and guidance of quality complaints towards the responsible Advanced Quality Assurance teams.
profile_positions.title: Resident Engineer, LDFSS BB

profile_positions.description:
TE Consumer Devices, 
Product development with focus on DFSS deployment of tools such as FMEA, DfMA, transfer function development / critical parameter management (requirements management)
Yield continuous improvement projects Asia factories with focus on data analysis.
Lean activities in the trend of standard work, 5S+1 and go Gemba walk the talk.
profile_positions.title: Development Engineer, LDFSS GB

profile_positions.location: Eindhoven Netherlands / San Jose CA USA
profile_positions.description:
LED System Design.
Advanced development of potential to be commercialized LED product architectures.
Development of functional demonstrators easy transformable to low cost high volume products. Process yield improvement for inline optical measurement production at Lumileds San Jose USA.
Trained to have focus on IP generation.
profile_positions.title: Development Engineer

profile_positions.location: Eindhoven Netherlands / Briarcliff Manor NY USA
profile_positions.description:
Product Development / Process Development / Optical Measurement Equipment.
Mechanical development of a mass production vacuum test system for Philips Lighting Chartres.
Development of a test measurement device for the first ASML Alpha-Tool light source at Philips Research.
Opto Mechanical development of LCOS projection television prototypes at Philips Research Briarcliff Manor USA. Facilitating road shows and demos. Writing technical documentation for handover to the business unit.
Development of all kind of Opto-Mechanical vision inspection systems.
Maintaining project cost budgets and writing technical operator instructions.
profile_positions.title: Opto-Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Mechanization project for Philips Drachten.
Concept study for simplification of a assembly unit (reduction of cycle time)
Preparation of drawings and TPD.
Supporting the manufacturing traject and debugging.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer
